content.text: What are you up to today?
I am trying to decide what to do today.
What are some of your interests?
I like to create websites, I am a huge fan of american literature and education, and I enjoy supporting my family.
That is awesome! I am trying to eat more fresh vegetables. I would love to go to a Chinese restaurant sometime.
I have driven a race car before. My favorite player is Mike Trout.
That is so cool! I am afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.
I feel like I am not living up to my full potential.
What do you want to accomplish?
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
That is a great goal! I am glad you have a support system.
